they said that more immediate opportunities for employment can be created by reducing taxes than a constructive plan compared to developmental projects could instantly with the relief in tax exemption create and as construction plans according them fastacting would jobs investment he respect development cut many opportunity instead of relaxation number vacancies formed through cuts place rebate produce instant reduced reductions rebates
